scripts.build: lerna exec -- cross-env REACT_STATIC_ENV=internal yarn build
scripts.watch: lerna exec --stream --parallel -- cross-env REACT_STATIC_ENV=internal yarn watch
scripts.test: lerna exec -- cross-env REACT_STATIC_ENV=internal yarn test
scripts.test:watch: lerna exec --parallel -- cross-env REACT_STATIC_ENV=internal yarn test:watch
